Name: Harmony Tablets Recipe
AttributesDescription: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to regain 20 Concerto Energy when releasing Intro Skill within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: A small, compact proportioning data card, the data of which is read by the Synthesizer to gain access to Synthesis' corresponding products.
ObtainedShowDescription: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to regain 20 Concerto Energy when releasing Intro Skill within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
